title: Council Decision of 15 October 1996 renewing the Management Board of the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 15  October 1996 renewing the Management Board of the European Centre for the Development of Vocational  Training (96/C  316/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed members of the Management Board of  the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training for the period from 15 October 1996  to 14 October 1999.
I. >TABLE>
II. >TABLE>
III. >TABLE>
This Decision shall be published, for information, in the Official Journal of the  European Communities.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 15 October 1996.
For the Council The President B. HOWLIN
(1) OJ No L 39, 13. 2. 1975, p. 1. Regulation as last amended by  Regulation (EC) No 354/95 (OJ No L  41, 23. 2. 1995, p. 1).
(2) OJ No C 39, 13. 2. 1993, p. 1.
(3) OJ No C 33, 6. 2. 1996, p. 2.
